name: Whack a Crackhead
description:
Whack A Mole will never be the same..... once you've Whacked a CrackHead! Mash them Meths, Crack them CrackHeads and Smack them Smackheads! They'll cuss and swear and complain but don't let that stop you!

Fun for the whole family.....well not really...... some profanity and mild  violence/ blood/ gore and bad humour  is in this content!

Instructions. After downloading the .zip file, just extract the contents to the desktop or the folder of your choice. Just make sure the whack.exe and the whack_data file are together in the same folder.

Gameplay: Whack as many crackheads and other critters as you can. The more you hit, the more extra time you get. If you reach enough points, you get a victory screen. Click on the arrow at the bottom right to progress to the next level.

What do you get for your money?  the Whack.zip file (42mb), 6 awesome levels of mindless head bashing fun, a sense of satisfaction that you are supporting an artist and possible psychopath and a warm fuzzy feeling.
